title.narrative: Rural WASHE in Monze, Southern Province - Zambia

description.narrative: This 3 year project is aimed at improving WASH services in the 8 wards of Monze town in the southern province. After 3 years, it is hoped that we would have reached 43,500 people with access to safe water and over 38,000 people with access to improved sanitation and hygiene practices. In order to do so, we hope to construct 92 new boreholes and rehabilitate 80 hand pumps. 5,680 latrines and 39 school blocks will be built .

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
